item.title: Billy Sheehan
item.description: William Sheehan is an American musician known for his work with Talas, Steve Vai, David Lee Roth, Mr. Big, Niacin, and The Winery Dogs. He had won the 'Best Rock Bass Player' readers' poll from Guitar Player magazine five times for his 'lead bass' playing style. Sheehan's repertoire included the use of chording, two-handed tapping, right-hand 'three-finger picking' technique and controlled feedback.
